title: Remodeled 1 BR / 1 BATH in Reflections Community
posting_body: ['Good credit a must:', 'Recently remodeled!!!', 'Beautiful 1 bedroom 1 bath condo with vaulted ceilings and wood burning fireplace.', 'Stainless appliances, granite kitchen and bathroom counters, scraped chestnut laminate floors throughout, travertine flooring in the entryway, kitchen and bathroom.', 'Nice condo community in San Ramon near the corner of Alcosta and Bollinger.', 'Gated with key or remote access.', 'Literally right across the street from Nob Hill / Market Place shopping center, which makes for easy grocery shopping.', 'Shopping center includes Gym, Multi-cultural Restaurants, dry cleaning, Cold Stone ice cream, Longs Drugs, Starbucks, etc.', 'Community includes: pool, spa, full gym, tennis court, car wash station, a minute walk to Iron Horse Trail, easy walk to Memorial/Bollinger Park.', 'In walking distance to Chevron, Bishop Ranch, the new City Center etc. Would be ideal for Chevron or Bishop Ranch employees.', 'Unit includes: All stainless steel appliances and granite counters in kitchen and bath.', 'Washer and Dryer, Stove / Oven, lighting fixtures, ceiling fan, One large bedroom, One full bathroom, large living room / dining room space, kitchen with all appliances including dishwasher and fridge.', 'Large mirrored closet in bedroom and hall storage closet.', 'Private deck with storage closet.', 'Large trees add shade and privacy to this unit.', 'Just steps to the community pool / spa / clubhouse / gym.']
